participant_1.background:
I've never been in a relationship, but I'm open to it if I find someone who shares my passion for dancing.
I spent my last birthday with my family at our farm, eating a delicious home-cooked meal and playing games.
i am a hardcore biker.
I spend time with my book club and read books I love.
i work at the pizza parlor.

participant_2.background:
I'd brag about how good my cake baking skills are.
I enjoy working out and staying active, even though my work life is boring.
I don't go to Comic Con because it is not my kind of thing.
i work as an extra for major motion pictures.
i have always wanted to travel to ireland or puerto rico.

content.text: Hi! My name is John. What's yours?
Hi John, my name is Sally. What do you do for fun?
I like to go dancing and spend time with my book club. What about you?
I spend time baking and working out. I also want to travel to Puerto Rico someday.
Have you ever been to Comic Con?
No, I haven't. I don't really go to those kinds of events.
Oh, that's too bad. I've always wanted to go.
Well, maybe you can come with me the next time I go.
Awesome! We can make a whole vacation out of it. We can go to Puerto Rico and Comic Con!
That sounds like a lot of fun!
I know, right? I'm excited to plan this trip.
Great! I'll start looking into flights and hotels.
